conbody.p: (b)(ii)(B) When the milestone decision authority is USD(A&S), submit notifications via DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 235.006 – Major Defense Program – Intent NOT to Exercise a Fixed Price Production Option on a Development Contract.”

(b)(iii)(B) Requests for USD(A&S) prenegotiation position or negotiated agreements approval are to be submitted via DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 235.006 – [Prenegotiation Position/Negotiated Agreement] Approval Request.”
